affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Magical
attrib:
STUN DURATION: 0.25 / 0.5 / 0.75 / 1
DAMAGE PER HIT: 25 / 40 / 55 / 70
INSTANCES: 3 / 3 / 3 / 3
cmb:
MANA COST: 110/130/150/160
COOLDOWN: 15
desc: Focuses Enigma's power on a target, causing it to take damage and become repeatedly stunned for multiple instances.  An instance strikes every 2 seconds.
lore: Strange gravities pull at the core of those who would oppose you, holding them in place.
name: enigma_malefice

attrib:
ATTACKS TO MULTIPLY: 6 / 6 / 6 / 6
EIDOLON HP: 180 / 200 / 220 / 240
EIDOLON DAMAGE: 20 / 28 / 38 / 47
cmb:
MANA COST: 170/170/170/170
COOLDOWN: 35
desc: Transforms a creep into three fragments of Engima himself.  These eidolons are all under Enigma's control, and repeated successful attacks cause them to multiply.  When this happens, the eidolons have their health restored.
notes:
Converted enemy units will give gold bounty and experience.
Denied creeps won't give experience or gold.
lore: Enigma is capable of drawing aspects of himself from other dimensions - the result is a trio of dark eidolons that hunt the corporeal plane.
name: enigma_demonic_conversion

attrib:
RADIUS: 600
DAMAGE PER SECOND: 3% / 3.75% / 4.5% / 5.25%
DURATION: 11
cmb:
MANA COST: 95/110/125/140
COOLDOWN: 35
desc: Steeps an area in dark resonance, damaging enemy units based on their max HP.
notes:
Damage goes through magic immunity.
This ability destroys trees in its area.
lore: A section of the world slowly descends into the void.
name: enigma_midnight_pulse

attrib:
HOLE RADIUS: 400
MIN DAMAGE RADIUS: 500
MIN DAMAGE: 25 / 50 / 75
MAX DAMAGE: 50 / 100 / 150
DURATION: 4
cmb:
MANA COST: 275/350/425
COOLDOWN: 200/190/180
desc:
CHANNELED - Summons a vortex that sucks in nearby enemy units. Enemies affected by Black Hole cannot move, attack, or cast spells. The closer units get to the center, the more damage is dealt.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
lore: The ground trembles as Enigma channels his ultimate vortex of destruction, a singularity with the power to end worlds.
name: enigma_black_hole
